3D Picture Control VIs

Owning Palette: Graphics & Sound VIs

Requires: Full Development System. This topic might not match its corresponding palette in LabVIEW depending on your operating system, licensed product(s), and target.

Use the 3D Picture Control VIs to display graphical representations of objects in 3D scenes.

SubpaletteDescription
File Loading VIsUse the File Loading VIs to load geometries of various model types in a 3D scene graph.
Geometries VIsUse the Geometries VIs to assign or configure the shapes of objects in a 3D scene.
Helpers VIsUse the Helpers VIs to perform some common tasks in setting up a 3D scene.
Object VIsUse the Object VIs to create or find objects to use in a 3D scene.
Transformations VIsUse the Transformations VIs to apply common transformations—such as rotation, translation, and scaling—to objects in a 3D scene graph.
